Package FOMS.order_manager

Class OrderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • FOMS.order_manager.OrderManager
  • public class OrderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages orders placed by customers, including creation, status tracking, and persistence. The OrderManager class interacts with the CartManager to process and place orders.
    Since:
    2024-04-24

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OrderManager()
      Constructs an OrderManager object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrderManager

        public OrderManager()
        Constructs an OrderManager object. Initializes the map to store orders and loads next order ID from file.

    • Method Detail

      • placeOrder

        public java.lang.String placeOrder​(CartManager cartManager,
                                   java.lang.String orderType)
        Places an order based on the items in the provided CartManager. Generates a new order ID, adds the order to the map, and clears the cart. Saves the next order ID for persistence.
        Parameters:
        cartManager - The CartManager containing the items to be ordered.
        orderType - The type of the order (e.g., dine-in, takeout).
        Returns:
        The ID of the placed order, or null if the cart is empty.

      • getOrderStatus

        public OrderStatus getOrderStatus​(java.lang.String orderId)
        Retrieves the status of a specific order identified by its order ID.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The ID of the order to check.
        Returns:
        The status of the order, or null if the order ID is invalid.

      • saveOrderToFile

        public void saveOrderToFile​(Order order,
                            java.lang.String SelectedBranch,
                            java.lang.String filename)
        Saves the details of the provided order to a file for persistence.
        Parameters:
        order - The order to save.
        SelectedBranch - The branch where the order was placed.
        filename - The name of the file to save to.

      • getOrderById

        public Order getOrderById​(java.lang.String orderId)
        Retrieves the order associated with the provided order ID.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The ID of the order to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The order corresponding to the provided ID, or null if not found.
